message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product at a price of $850000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that still reflects the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to ensure I get a good return on my investment.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $790000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.
